summary: Comprehensive testing of new security features and light theme completed. Document access security with codes, watermarking, and download logging fully functional. Masterplan successfully switched to light/prestigious theme with CartoDB Light tiles. All new admin features working correctly.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 403 instead of expected 401 for unauthorized access
minor_bugs.impact: Functionality works correctly, just different status code

passed_tests: Masterplan page has light/prestigious theme with white background and pastel colors
CartoDB Light tile layer successfully implemented instead of dark theme
Legend colors correct: green for disponible, orange for option, red for vendu
Premium View indicator present in light theme navbar
Documents Sécurisés section with lock icon in parcelle detail sidebar
Access code input field with proper validation (J7E7CN4J test code works)
Legal notice modal appears with watermark information and confidentiality warnings
Document access verification and unlock functionality working
Admin dashboard has new 'Codes d'accès' section in sidebar
Admin can generate new access codes via POST /api/admin/access-codes
Admin dashboard shows 'Journal' section for download logs with statistics
API POST /api/documents/verify-code validates access codes correctly
API GET /api/admin/download-logs returns download history with proper tracking
API GET /api/admin/download-logs/stats provides client and parcelle statistics
Access codes table shows active codes with expiration dates and client info
Download logs show detailed tracking: client, code, parcelle, document type, timestamp
